Content ideas for our Instagram page
Instagram Content Ideas

Why Instagram?

We all know how great Instagram is for sharing photos and videos with our friends and family, but it’s also an incredible channel for ecommerce marketing. But why? Well, an obvious reason is Instagram’s format. Because of this visual nature, Instagram holds massive opportunities for ecommerce businesses looking to showcase their products. Whether through regular photos, videos, or Instagram Stories, millions of businesses have learned that building a visual presence on Instagram can hugely compliment their ecommerce marketing. As you scroll down, you can see various creative content marketing ideas.

Company Profile

Company profile is a must!

A company profile is a professional business description. It's very important to let people know a general idea about us before creating any posts. Details like company name, established date, physical address per location, phone numbers, website URL, and email address should appear at the beginning of the business profile. It should always be accurate and up-to- date.

Instagram stories

Instagram stories to build our audience

Instagram stories is a growing business opportunity. Every day, more than half a billion people consume Instagram stories. It's a huge market, and it's still rising. Stories will also drive traffic back to the feed so that you can beat the algorithm, or at least increase your interaction when you show up in Stories. They also have features like poll, question, countdown, quiz that can help us do surveys and interact with our audience.

Listing our benefits

Offering a list of benefits of our business

If a company doesn't benefit an individual, why would they bother to join, right? So listing how they can get benefits from our company is a good way to drive an audience. They should get an idea of how they can grow as a person and also increase their skills by joining our company. We should also be able to note why we are different from other companies.

Thought Bubble

Thought Bubble, a unique way to reach out!

Sharing some wisdom from others who have been in our company through a thought bubble. We can pair it with a photo and share it with a caption. This will reach out to people about how our employees feel and think about the company. When we all think or do the same thing, there would be no new thoughts or experience, so it’s a fun way to let people learn about us from their perspective.

Concepts

Let's share some concepts

People enjoy seeing inside what you're working on. People love to share their opinions, too. Sharing a few concepts for a recent project allows people to get a glimpse of your work, and inviting them to choose their favorite project gives them a reason to comment and engage with your post.

Sneak Peek

Just a little sneak-peek!

Creating a project hype and anticipation will generate excitement for your company. Something as simple as a logo sketch or a screenshot of a new website or ideas for an ongoing project can leave people on pins and needles for final disclosure. Thus, they tend to come back or even do some research on us!

Projects

Past, recent and upcomping projects

If there are any past or recent projects, it would be insane not to share them with followers on Instagram. Sharing bits and pieces of the project and tracking down the progress of the project in an Instagram post will make people interested to learn more about us. To create even more engagement, we can ask people which project or feature is their favorite and also let them share their ideas towards our projects.

Encouragement

Let's encourage and inspire people

We can also share some motivation and build people up for our work by sharing stories of our own employees. Posts like this can reach out to people and often generate a lot of engagement through likes and sharing, which leads to a wider reach. Let’s be a company to inspire!

Annoucement

Annoucing to the world

Whether it's a big project that's about to be launched or a huge milestone that's about to be reached, Instagram is a great place to share news and create excitement for your business. Announcements for jobs, internships and workshops that may be of interest to them also create a hype.

Team

Our team

Followers can get to know the faces behind the scenes through an Instagram post or a series of Instagram stories! Not only does this humanize our company, but it also forges more personal connections and helps followers to feel like they know us. It's a very nice way to appreciate the team and let the world know about them as well. It can help them network with more people and build their own connections. It’s a win-win!
